General.Name: Bms Birlesik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Bms Birlesik Metal Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the manufacture and sale of galvanized steel wires in Turkey. The company offers hot-dip galvanized, Zn-AI coated steel, stranded, and black annealed wires. It serves automotive, energy, agriculture, environmental protection system, construction, and industrial application sectors. The company also exports its products in 45 countries, including Europe, North America, and South America. Bms Birlesik Metal Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1968 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
